channel.title: Drupal on ninjaduck
channel.description: Recent content in Drupal on ninjaduck

item.title: A summer for Drupal
item.description: Today has been great for me in many ways. I reached the 1000 friends mark on fb, scored good in an exam. But the best thing that happened to me today is getting accepted into Google Summer Of Code'14. This is the first time I applied in this program and getting selected has been nothing less than pure bliss. I am exaggerating a little here but there is that feeling that lasts just for a few seconds.
